personalInfo.name: Isha Narola
personalInfo.title: Senior Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Experienced Senior Software Engineer with 3+ years of expertise in ReactJS and NextJS development. Proven track record of building scalable web applications with modern JavaScript frameworks, state management solutions, and RESTful API integrations. Strong background in full-stack development with excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.

responsibilities: Developed scalable web applications using ReactJS and NextJS
Implemented state management solutions with Redux and Context API
Built responsive UI components with modern design systems
Integrated RESTful APIs and real-time data solutions
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in agile environments
achievements: Implemented AWS cloud solutions with 99.9% uptime
Mentored junior developers and led code reviews

projects.title: ESAI Work
projects.description: Comprehensive administrative web application designed to streamline organizational workflows and provide advanced data visualization for internal and external users.
features: Dual UI interfaces for internal and external users
Dynamic reporting system for different user roles
Multi-feature data tables with search, filtering, sorting, pinning, and column visibility control
Advanced filters based on position, specialization, and stage
Clear filters and quick navigation between report pages
Excel data export with language-specific formatting

projects.title: RECOUPLE
projects.description: Energy management and analytics platform providing lifecycle management of contracts, projects, emissions, and financial forecasting for organizations.
features: AWS Cognito authentication with Google login and MFA
Business selection and permission-driven UI after login
Contract creation with date overlap validation
Resource management with units, sub-units, and preferred units
Emission sources with timeline-based emission factor handling
Conversion of contracts into opportunities and projects
Scenario planning with targets and opportunity management
Economic-lifeâ€“based expense, cashflow, and forecasting calculations
Interactive dashboards for energy, emissions, revenue, and reductions
CSV upload and drag-and-drop data records
Business, site, and asset management with GPS-based mapping

projects.title: Shipnavi
projects.description: E-commerce platform offering product purchasing and bidding functionality with a secure and user-friendly shopping experience.
features: Shopping cart with optimized checkout flow
Multiple shipping options with shipping cost calculation

projects.title: Techeeta
projects.description: Real-time game analytics platform integrating sensor-based data to track player performance, health metrics, and movement analytics.
features: Real-time data streaming using socket connections (Insider Cloud)
Sensor connection and live player data tracking
Football tracker with positional and time-based analytics
Hub device integration with Electron desktop application

projects.title: ESAI Jobs
projects.description: Job search platform designed to help users discover, save, and manage job opportunities with advanced filtering and communication features.
features: Advanced job listing and search functionality
Shortened job sharing URLs using Short.io

academicProjects.title: Gift Recommendation Website
academicProjects.description: Developed a collaborative web platform with a team of 5 members. Created recommendation engine for gift suggestions based on relationships. Implemented user-friendly interface for easy gift discovery and selection.

academicProjects.title: ExamPaper Management System
academicProjects.description: Built digital repository for exam question papers with permanent database storage. Developed categorization system by subject, exam type, branch, and semester. Enabled easy upload and retrieval functionality for faculty and students.
